title: You have been disconnected from chat
body: For some odd reason, my chat keeps disconnecting and reconnecting. The chat in game is fine, the only thing that's getting effected are the chats on the client that keeps disconnecting and reconnecting itself every 4 or 5 seconds or so. The chats in the champ select screen and the post game chat are also getting effected. I'm running the beta client on a MacBook Air. Any help would be appreciated.

replies.body: Your network can have trouble connecting to specific servers, in this case the chat server.  My recommendation would be to go over the steps of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix that up.  Make sure to select Mac for instructions specific to your OS.  Let me know if you have any questions.
